name: Mast3r and Sl3ve
description:
Mast3r & Sl3ve it's a game create for the GMTK 2021 in Unreal Engine 5.

The videogame is based on the theme "Joined Together". 

In this case we have Mast3r, a small robot which can control Sl3ve, a small ball of energy that will give its energy in the different levels of the system.

Mast3r is in charge of moving Sl3ve in a rather unusual way. If Mast3r moves in one direction, Sl3ve will also move in the same direction. He takes advantage of the walls of the levels to create a way to reach the loading platform and move to the next level.

But be careful!

Sl3ve will not be able to survive or move if he is not at the right distance.

Recover the energy of the system and complete this challenge in the shortest time possible. You will be able to upload your time in each level with a screenshot in the comments of our itch.io.

Thank you for downloading our game and we hope you like it!

Rebel Team members

Angel Gonzalez

Carlos Puche

Javier Requena

Regards and thank for playing it, The Rebel Team

PD: Special thanks to our collegue Joselvent Suarez, for give us support, love and mentoring with the rigging process!

Special thanks to Kenney.nl for the SFX of the game
